title: About Love
lyrics:
Gakkeum nege malhae salang-eun ajig eolyeoun geos gatdago
Geuleom neon geunyang (saljjag) naleul bogo (us-eo)
Amu mal eobs-i gaman nae du son-eul ttaseuhi gamssa
Isanghae neolang iss-eul ttaemyeon dandul-i iss-eul ttaemyeon
Byeol-ildo anin yaegil mudjido anh-eun yaegil teol-eonwa

Geujeo nae yaegie gwileul giul-yeo juneun ge

Gyeot-e yeong-wonhi neoneun nae pyeon-i dwaejul geos gat-a



Ne ileum-eul gaman bulleobomyeon

Salanghandan mal gat-a

Sumgil su eobs-i dugeundae

Buleugo bulleobwado maeil geulae

Jigeumcheoleom maju boneun ge

Da salang-in geosman gat-a

Idaelo uli dul-iman

Sigan-i meomchwoss-eumyeon jeongmal johgess-eo



Gakkeum-eun chingul manna eodileul gado

Mas-issneun eumsig-i nal gippeuge haedo

Jakkuman ne saeng-gag-e Right sajin-eul jjig-eo Take

Da-eum-en neolang ol geolago maengsehae (That's right)



Museun yaegileul haedo eoneusae jeomjeom

Neoe daehan jalangdeullo sigan-i heulleo

Tteol-eojyeo issneundedo

Two of us eonjena Two of us

Jigeumdo neoui gyeot-e issneun geos gat-a



Yunanhi jichin halu kkeut-e nunmul-i walkaghal ttae

Amuleon maldo eobs-i gamanhi eokkael naeeo juneun neo

Machi appacheoleom pogeunhi an-ajul ttaemyeon

Gyeot-e yeong-wonhi neoneun nae pyeon-i dwaejul geos gat-a



Ne ileum-eul gaman bulleobomyeon

Salanghandan mal gat-a

Sumgil su eobs-i dugeundae

Buleugo bulleobwado maeil geulae

Jigeumcheoleom maju boneun ge

Da salang-in geosman gat-a

Idaelo uli dul-iman

Sigan-i meomchwoss-eumyeon jeongmal johgess-eo



Na ttaeloneun jogeum nollagon hae

Eojjeomyeon neolang nalang 1buteo 10kkaji da

Ttoggat-eun saeng-gagdeul-eul haneun geonji



Sasil gakkeumssig honja saeng-gaghaess-eo

Eojjeomyeon neolang nalang gat-eun salam inga bwa

Animyeon i modeun geol mwolago da seolmyeonghae



Neoman bomyeon jakku us-eum-i na salang-in geol al-ass-eo

Pogaejin du son sailo

Ne mam-i ppajim-eobs-i da neukkyeojyeo

Ije naega nege boyeojulge keojyeobeolin salang-eul

Teugbyeolhal geon eobsgessjiman ontong da

Neo hanalo gadeug chaeullae



Ne ileum-eul gaman bulleobomyeon

Salanghandan mal gat-a

Sumgil su eobs-i dugeundae

Buleugo bulleobwado maeil geulae

Jigeumcheoleom maju boneun ge

Da salang-in geosman gat-a

Idaelo uli dul-iman

Sigan-i meomchwoss-eumyeon jeongmal johgess-eo
